query:
INSERT INTO repos (id, path, name, display_name)
               VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)
               ON CONFLICT(path) DO UPDATE SET updated_at = updated_at
               RETURNING id as "id!: Uuid",
                         path,
                         name,
                         display_name,
                         created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                         updated_at as "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
